task.title: Installing the telestion-client CLI
task.shortdesc: You can install the telestion-client CLI using npm. It provides a lot of functionality for developing PSCs, including creating new projects, bootstrapping widgets, building PSCs, and more.

taskbody.prereq: Since the CLI is available via the npm registry, you need to have npm installed on your system and ready to use.
taskbody.result: The telestion-client CLI is now installed and the tc-cli commanded added to your path and ready to use.
